about_the_game: A playable demo contains the first 3 acts of the main campaign. Please do play the demo before purchasing the game.
detailed_description: A playable demo contains the first 3 acts of the main campaign. Please do play the demo before purchasing the game.
name: Command Line Mazer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 4.0

short_description: Command Line Mazer is a casual strategy game using Unix-like command-line interface. You will command virus to gather resources while avoiding being caught by anti-virus.
